values.content:
=Based on the following email I sent from {{ $json.fromMail }}:
{{ $json.Sent }}

And the following reply I received from {{ $json.toName }} ({{ $json.toMail }}):
{{ $json.Received }}

Use the content from the attached Google Doc as the primary source for crafting useful and engaging response that is most likely to increase the recipientâ€™s interest or engagement. If specific information required for a response is not available in the document, generate the reply based on what would be most suitable or relevant given the context.

To write a reply, You need to write it to {{ $json.toName }} and the sender is {{ $json.fromMail }}.

If the received message is positive and expresses interest, requests more information, or suggests further discussion, include the following Calendly link in the responses to allow the recipient to easily book a call:

{{ $json.meetingLink }}

Only include the Calendly link if the message shows a clear intent for follow-up or further conversation.

from the message I sent, you can extract the receipient name as well. if no name is there, then just write hello, hey or whatever suitable.

Just write the response, no label, no header, just a reply that you have generated. You should only return one best possible reply.

assignments.name: meetingReply
assignments.value:
=Hey {{ $json.toName }},
Please use the following link to book sometime.
{{ $json.meetingLink }}
Talk soon!

parameters.text: You have rejected the CleverResponder's suggested reply. You have to reply manually.

parameters.message:
=Hey!
A few days ago we sent a meeting booking link to {{ $('Route Reply').item.json.toName }} ({{ $('Route Reply').item.json.toMail }}) as they showed interest or requested meeting.
As a follow up, I am checking in with you, whether do you want me to send a friendly reminder to book a meeting?

parameters.text: Cool, Hope you have a great meeting!

parameters.message:
=Hello,
Before a few days, we sent a meeting booking link to {{ $('Set Reply').item.json.toName }} ({{ $('Set Reply').item.json.toMail }}). Just checking to see if they have booked a meeting. If not, I can simply send a friendly reminder to book a meeting.
Use the below button either to send a meeting reminder or not.

parameters.text: Cool, Hope you have a great meeting!

body.subject: Information Technology Service
body.sent_message_body:
Hello Krunal 
This is via smartlead.
Our company is providing various information technology related services. Are you interested? Here's the list of services:
1) Website Development
2) Cybersecurity
3) CRM and workflow automation
4) Multimedia
5) Human Resource
If you decide to go with our services then we can give you a massive discount/discounts on the services.
Feel free to reach.
Best,
IT Services Pvt Ltd
